New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit the fastest pitch recorded in MLB history with a speed of 112.7 mph (181.3 km/h)
Key Match Events: Los Angeles Angels took the lead with a 2-1 score after Logan O'Hoppe hit a solo home run in the 2nd inning. The Angels then reversed the score to 6-2 with a 4-point rally in the 10th inning, including a time-lead home run by Mike Trout.
Pre-Game Insights: The game was the first of a two-game series between the Los Angeles Angels and Los Angeles Dodgers at the Angel Stadium (California, Los Angeles).
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections were provided in the article.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed due to rain and was rescheduled for the next day.
Others: No other significant mentions were provided in the article.
